attributes.action: not deport my husband have a right to stay in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being married for 6 years, and together for 8 years also have 2 children together the home office want to deport my husband. He also been detained for over 2 weeks which means he is away for his wife and two children. He is a hard working man and a student at university studying computer science, i am also a student doing a degree in nursing. Please don't the let the home office do this we are a geuine family, who just wants to get on with our lives and have a better life with our children. Please give him the right to stay in this country as the children can not be apart from their dad and myself.

rejection.details: Individual immigration cases are a matter for direct communication with the United Kingdom Border Agency.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
